snippet: Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford has been ruled out for up to two months with a knee injury, in what manager David Moyes has described as a major disappointment for his relegation-threatened team....
lead_paragraph: Sunderland goalkeeper Jordan Pickford has been ruled out for up to two months with a knee injury, in what manager David Moyes has described as a major disappointment for his relegation-threatened team.

headline.main: Moyes Suffers Injury Blow With Pickford Out for Two Months
headline.print_headline: Moyes Suffers Injury Blow With Pickford Out for Two Months
